favourite.article: Thank You Lord. May all the churches rejoice to give themselves fully to You.

Lord thank You for giving Yourself to me. Now I want to give myself to You. I Love You Lord, I am opening my entire being to You so You can fill me with Yourself. May evey avenue of my being be saturated by Your Life so we can express You!

Lord thank You for everything You have done for us... to redeem us with Your precious blood...I give You myself everyday. Saints, we give ourselves to Him day by day. We should consecrate ourselves to Him. Be focus, and our goal is Him.... Amen... I love You Lord Jesus.
Never leave your consecration to another day! Lord, I give myself to You Right Now! Praise the Lord He never forgets and always honors our consecrations!

this song cause me to remember my consecration before the Lord. OH LORD JESUS! Truly that we are not our own for He has bought us with a high price. Day by day may we allow Him to occupy our being and may we give ourselves to Him not just one day but every moment of our life. OH LORD JESUS WE LOVE YOU SO MUCH! Nothing or no one can replace You in my heart.

I feel the Lord is embracing me while singing this hymn. I feel comforted. Most of the times we are distracted by so many things and we forget the Lord. We need to give yourself to Him always. We need to turn to Him.
Our hearts are not always ready to consecrate, but when we can consecrate, we are the happiest person in the world!

Amen! This song is so very nice and encourages us to give ourselves to the Lord and be His useful vessels for His economy. May the Lord touch us and have mercy on us. Amen! From young people in Paranaque.

LORD JESUS! Now I found the church meeting here in Japan, again I want to renew my consecration for your gospel work here. May You use me as a functioning member of Your Body. I consecrate my whole being for You alone, because You are my FOCUS and My GOAL. Praise You Lord there is a wonderful church life in the whole universe. Truly You are the living God walking in every locality. I don't want to be a Sunday goer or church goer every meetings but a fruitful Christian expressing You wherever I go. Living in You in my idle time and loving Your Word as my very sword to fight the enemy. Do preserve my love ones, my own family gained them for Your testimony. Take my life, and my everything to be use by You. Amen!

I love this song so much that it caused me to turn to my spirit deeper and deeper regardless of the situation I'm in without fail. And this song renews my consecration to the Lord for the FTTMY next Thurs. May He be my focus and my goal!!

This is such a beautiful tune, and such an opportunity to open to the Lord. I love how the music moves me to tears, and I open to the Lord. Of course I should not rely on music to turn me to the Lord, but it has often been a rescue to sing to the Lord...from both my experience and another brother's experience.

Hallelujah! This song popped into my head as I was driving home from class, and I just turned to the Lord. It doesn't matter where we are, what we feel, how our circumstances have been arranged, we can give ourselves over and over to Him. Jesus is good!
Yes, its a very good and touching hymn.. we should all give ourself to the Lord,let Him work on us and transform us to be the overcomers. Praise the Lord, the Lord is GOOD!!!
Lord, i give myself to you right now, but not knowing that whether i had really given myself to You. Lord, remember me, at least, I have the heart to do so, and may You be joyful for my consecration.

This song is so wonderful. I am able to leave all else behind for Him! Hallelujah! This song was sung with a group of young people from the Summer School of the Truth and it just made them want to be genuinely occupied with Him.

Lord, I give myself to You RIGHT NOW. Praise the Lord for RIGHT NOW. I love this song because no matter how I failed yesterday, last week, last month...I still have RIGHT NOW. We Christian don't have yesterday or tomorrow; all we have is RIGHT NOW. So what should we wait till tomorrow? We can give ourselves to the Lord RIGHT NOW!!

Well, there seems to be a way that we could sometimes feel the completeness of the Lord in our lives. And this song only reminds us of being in Him throughout and keeping ourselves intact to Him. Loving the Lord is and always will be the most meaningful time or moment that we could spend for the rest of our lives. Praise Him forever! TO GOD BE THE GLORY!

This song reminded me to renew and refresh "again" my consecration before the Lord. I really love to sing this song. It tells us to leave everything behind and focus only on the Lord... May we all desire and be eager to renew our consecration before the Lord and to give our very First and Best Love to Him! Lord, I Love You. I give myself to You right now!!!! Amen!!!!
This song is very meaningful to me. It is a song of consecration, for it says, "Lord I give myself to You right now." I wanna be occupied by the Lord Jesus.
